title: Into the Reach
description: Book 1 of the Redemption trilogy set in the new setting from White Silver Publishing of Ramlar.In the land of Eranon, the Reach is a desolate place where people journey to forget who they are. Now, a menace rises from this wasteland, and he is hunting for someone. To keep the madman and his chaos behind the Reach, four adventurers with haunted pasts must rise to the challenge. But how how can failed heroes bring hope to others when they doubt themselves?
author: Alana Joli Abbott
